findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to perform various actions such as swapping and liquifying, withdrawing tokens, distributing taxes, excluding from fees, marking addresses as bots, changing marketing, buyback and development addresses, and more.

findings.title: _distributeTax() won’t work on native tokens balance excess
findings.description: The _distributeTax() function will not operate correctly when dealing with native token balances exceeding a certain threshold.
